mapper.select: /* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectClassRoomList */ SELECT AL.LCTRE_NO , C.COURSE_NM , P.PRFSOR_NM , (SELECT COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC014' AND COM_CODE = L.COMPL_SE) COMPL_SE , (SELECT COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC015' AND COM_CODE = L.LCTRE_SE) LCTRE_SE FROM ATTENDANCE_LECTURE AL INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (L.LCTRE_NO = AL.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN PROFESSOR P ON (P.PRFSOR_NO = L.PRFSOR_NO) INNER JOIN COURSE C ON (C.COURSE_NO = L.COURSE_NO) INNER JOIN CLASSROOM CR ON (CR.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) WHERE STDNT_NO = #{id} AND L.SEMSTR_SE = #{semCd}

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectHomeWorkList */ SELECT CB.CR_NO , (SELECT COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC020' AND COM_CODE = CB.CR_SE) CR_SE_NM , CB.CR_TITLE , CB.CR_CN , CB.CR_WRTER , CB.CR_DATE , CB.ATCH_FILE_NO , CB.LCTRE_NO , CASE (SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM LECTURE_SUBMIT WHERE STDNT_NO = AL.STDNT_NO AND CR_NO = CB.CR_NO) WHEN 1 THEN '제출완료' ELSE '미제출' END AS SUBMITTED FROM ATTENDANCE_LECTURE AL INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (L.LCTRE_NO = AL.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN CLASSROOM CR ON (CR.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN CLASSROOM_BOARD CB ON (CB.LCTRE_NO = CR.LCTRE_NO) WHERE CB.CR_SE = '01' AND L.SEMSTR_SE = #{semCd} AND AL.STDNT_NO = #{id} AND CB.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo}

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectTestQuestionList */ SELECT COURSE_NM , (SELECT COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC021' AND COM_CODE = TQ.TEST_SE) TEST_SE_NM , TQ.TEST_SE , TQ.LCTRE_NO , (TQ.TEST_QUST_TIME /60)||'분' TEST_TIME_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TEST_ANSWER_PAPER WHERE LCTRE_NO = TQ.LCTRE_NO AND TEST_SE = TQ.TEST_SE) QUESTION_CNT , CASE WHEN (SELECT NVL(COUNT(1),0) FROM SUBMIT_ANSWER_PAPER WHERE LCTRE_NO = TQ.LCTRE_NO AND TEST_SE = TQ.TEST_SE AND STDNT_NO = AL.STDNT_NO) > 0 THEN '응시완료' ELSE '미응시' END AS QUESTIONABLE FROM TEST_QUESTION TQ INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (L.LCTRE_NO = TQ.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN COURSE C ON (C.COURSE_NO = L.COURSE_NO) INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_LECTURE AL ON (AL.LCTRE_NO = L.LCTRE_NO) WHERE TQ.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo} AND AL.STDNT_NO = #{id} AND L.SEMSTR_SE = #{semCd}

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectTestQuestion */ SELECT TQ.TEST_SE , TQ.LCTRE_NO , TQ.ATCH_FILE_NO , TQ.TEST_QUST_TIME , (TQ.TEST_QUST_TIME /60)||'분' TEST_TIME_NM , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TEST_ANSWER_PAPER WHERE LCTRE_NO = TQ.LCTRE_NO AND TEST_SE = TQ.TEST_SE) QUESTION_CNT FROM TEST_QUESTION TQ INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_LECTURE AL ON (AL.LCTRE_NO = TQ.LCTRE_NO) WHERE TQ.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo} AND AL.STDNT_NO = #{stdntNo} AND TQ.TEST_SE = #{testSe} AND TQ.LCTRE_NO NOT IN (SELECT LCTRE_NO FROM SUBMIT_ANSWER_PAPER WHERE STDNT_NO = AL.STDNT_NO AND TEST_SE = #{testSe})

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectAttatchingFileList */ SELECT ATCH_FILE_NO , ATCH_FILE_SN , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_PATH , ATCH_FILE_MG , ATCH_FILE_INDICT_MG , ATCH_FILE_MIME_TYPE FROM ATTACHING_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = #{atchFileNo}

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectClassRoomBoardList */ SELECT CR_NO , (SELECT COM_CODE_NM FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC020' AND COM_CODE = CB.CR_SE) CR_SE_NM , CR_TITLE , CR_CN , CR_WRTER , P.PRFSOR_NM , CR_DATE , CB.ATCH_FILE_NO , CB.LCTRE_NO FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD CB INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_LECTURE AL ON (CB.LCTRE_NO = AL.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (L.LCTRE_NO = AL.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN COURSE C ON (C.COURSE_NO = L.COURSE_NO) INNER JOIN PROFESSOR P ON (L.PRFSOR_NO = P.PRFSOR_NO) WHERE AL.STDNT_NO = #{id} AND AL.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo} AND L.SEMSTR_SE = #{semCd} AND CB.CR_SE != '01' ORDER BY CR_SE DESC,CR_NO

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectOnlineLectureList */ SELECT LV.LCTRE_VIDO_NO , LV.LCTRE_NO , LV.LCTRE_VD_WEEK , LV.LCTRE_VD_TM , LV.LCTRE_VD_STDR_TM , LV.LCTRE_VD_BEGIN_TM , LV.LCTRE_VD_END_TM , LV.ATCH_FILE_NO FROM LECTURE_VIDEO LV INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (L.LCTRE_NO = LV.LCTRE_NO) INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_LECTURE AL ON (LV.LCTRE_NO = AL.LCTRE_NO) WHERE AL.STDNT_NO = #{id} AND AL.LCTRE_NO = #{lctreNo} AND L.SEMSTR_SE = #{semCd}

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectOneAttatchingFile */ SELECT ATCH_FILE_NO , ATCH_FILE_SN , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_PATH , ATCH_FILE_MG , ATCH_FILE_INDICT_MG , ATCH_FILE_MIME_TYPE FROM ATTACHING_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = #{atchFileNo} AND ATCH_FILE_SN = #{atchFileSn}

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectTestResultInfo */ SELECT AT.ATCH_FILE_NO , ATCH_FILE_SN , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_PATH , ATCH_FILE_MG , ATCH_FILE_INDICT_MG , ATCH_FILE_MIME_TYPE FROM LECTURE_SUBMIT LS INNER JOIN ATTACHING_FILE AT ON (LS.ATCH_FILE_NO = AT.ATCH_FILE_NO) WHERE LS.STDNT_NO = #{id} AND LS.CR_NO = #{crNo}

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectClassroomBoard */ SELECT CB.CR_NO , CR_SE , CR_TITLE , CR_CN , (SELECT P.PRFSOR_NM FROM PROFESSOR P INNER JOIN LECTURE L ON (L.PRFSOR_NO = P.PRFSOR_NO) WHERE L.LCTRE_NO = (SELECT LCTRE_NO FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD WHERE CR_NO = #{crNo})) CR_WRTER , CR_DATE , CB.LCTRE_NO , AF.ATCH_FILE_NO , ATCH_FILE_SN , ATCH_FILE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_NM , ATCH_FILE_STRE_PATH , ATCH_FILE_MG , ATCH_FILE_INDICT_MG , ATCH_FILE_MIME_TYPE FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD CB INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_LECTURE AL ON (CB.LCTRE_NO = AL.LCTRE_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACHING_FILE AF ON(CB.ATCH_FILE_NO = AF.ATCH_FILE_NO) WHERE CB.CR_NO = #{crNo} AND AL.STDNT_NO = #{id}

/* kr.ac.usu.classroom.mapper.StudentClassRoomMapper.selectAuthorityFile */ SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CLASSROOM_BOARD CB INNER JOIN ATTENDANCE_LECTURE AL ON(AL.LCTRE_NO = CB.LCTRE_NO) WHERE (AL.STDNT_NO = #{stdntNo} AND CB.ATCH_FILE_NO = #{atchFileNo}) ) + ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM LECTURE_SUBMIT LS WHERE (LS.STDNT_NO = #{stdntNo} AND LS.ATCH_FILE_NO = #{atchFileNo}) ) FROM DUAL
